titleStmt.title: John McIntire to Ephraim L. Van Winkle
CWG2137

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Washington County Ky.
Springfield July 6th/65
E L Vanwinkle Secretary of State yours of July 1st came to hand in due Time

With regard to the filing of the accesordTerm of John Rodgers Esqr. there has no com. Came to the office here Mr. Isah. Prather handed me a petition from his Rodgers district with Severel names. Requesting me to send it to you for the purpose of Getting a Com for himself. I directed him to Enclose it himself which I presume he did
Mr. Prather is a very Clevor Gentleman and will suit the place to which he aspires Please Send him a Com

Respectfully yours
John McIntire P. J. W. C. C

Justice Peace
Washington
Resig & appt
10th July/65
